backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining data models and in‑memory maps for users, products, appointments, publications, videos, and access control with mixins for authorization and blob storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two frontend updates related to Training Document #3 PDF handling and UI link logic, including impacted files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten one‑sentence summaries of major frontend components and hooks across the React app.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that loads the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling authentication, payment status routing, profile setup modal, and rendering all major site sections with a forced light theme.
frontend/src/components/Biography.tsx: Biography section component fetching biography content and rendering an animated parallax design with portrait, overlays, and styled text.
frontend/src/components/Booking.tsx: Booking component showing consulting rate details and member-only access gating with login prompts and link to membership plans.
frontend/src/components/CartDrawer.tsx: Implements a side drawer shopping cart with item listing, total calculation, Stripe checkout handling, and cart management actions.
frontend/src/components/Contact.tsx: Displays contact information fetched from backend including phone, email, and location within a styled card.
frontend/src/components/Credentials.tsx: Renders a credentials section showing Ph.D. and Master's diploma images with decorative styling.
frontend/src/components/DnsStatusChecker: Empty component file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Provides a footer containing professional credential text and a copyright notice with a link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Creates a responsive header with navigation, scroll effects, and authentication controls using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Renders an animated hero section with parallax background layers, glowing effects, and a portrait image.
frontend/src/components/Media.tsx: Displays a members‑only media section with access checks, parallax visuals, and prompts for login or membership.
frontend/src/components/Membership.tsx: Displays membership plans, user membership status, and PayPal subscription flow with loading states and animated UI.
frontend/src/components/PaymentFailure.t: Shows a payment cancellation screen with options to return home or scroll back to the membership section.
frontend/src/components/PaymentSuccess.t: Shows a payment success screen, refreshes membership-related queries, and offers navigation back home or to content.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal form for creating a user profile, submitting name, email, and optional phone via a saveProfile mutation.
frontend/src/components/Publications.tsx: Fetches and displays a list of publications with purchase links and a PayPal portal section.
frontend/src/components/Store.tsx: Shows hardcoded apparel items with Bonfire purchase links and optional QR codes.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetupModal: Modal for admins to enter and save Stripe secret key and allowed countries using a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/SupportDonations: Section displaying donation options with styled Venmo and Cash App cards and background effects.
frontend/src/components/TrainingVideos.t: Loads and displays training videos and documents with custom asset handling and PayPal link, showing loaders while fetching.
frontend/src/components/VideoModal.tsx: Empty placeholder file for a video modal component.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login, logout, and identity persistence using AuthClient within a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, content, access checks, store data, and training resources via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers, theme CSS variables for light/dark modes, and custom utility classes for glow, shadows, overlays, and decorative effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/utils/staticAssetUrl.ts: Builds safe URL-encoded asset paths, ensuring /assets/ prefix and handling absolute URLs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended OKLCH color variables, container settings, and custom shadows and radii.
project_state.json: Describes project state, known issues, and pending feature requests related to updating Training Document #3 and handling static PDF assets.
